title: Nicht weit von mir
abstract: What is a dream? What is reality? A lonely young lady stumbles upon a book about lucid dreaming—dreaming in which you can control your actions and are fully aware of being in a dream. Quickly she understands the new and unknown possibilities. The door is open, a bizarre play unravels … and there is still the real world waiting.
credits: Directed by Rüdiger Görlitz and Sanne Kurz
Featuring Jennifer Sabel, Florian Kleine & Anna Prüstel
